channel.title: [MILDLY-INTERESTING] Invoice language no ground to reject VAT deduction
channel.description:
Hey,
I stumbled upon the Twitter account of the EU Tax & Customs Department and decided to ask them a question that has been on my mind for a while.
Their response was pretty swift I have to say: https://twitter.com/EU_Taxud/status/684058417670021120
From my understanding of the documentation provided national authorities can NOT generally require you to translate all invoices into national language.
